party: Read the last message you sent — with full dramatic flair.
Do your best impersonation of someone else in this room — until someone guesses who.
Show the last selfie you took — no explanations.
Let someone in the room scroll through your camera roll for 10 seconds.
Sing the chorus of the last song you listened to — or drink.
Tell the group who you’d hook up with — if you had to pick someone here.
Text 'You up?' to someone random in your contacts and show us their reply later.
Swap an item of clothing with someone of the opposite gender.
Let someone give you a new profile picture — and set it for 5 minutes.
Let the group write one sentence to post in your group chat — or back out and drink.
Do a sexy dance to a random song — someone else picks the track.
Give a lap dance to someone chosen by the group — or finish your drink.
Attempt to twerk for 10 seconds — no excuses.
Take a selfie with the person to your left and post it somewhere with zero context.
Let someone else go through your most-used emojis and guess your last 3 convos.
Call someone and confess a fake crush — make it believable.
Let someone draw something on your face using eyeliner, marker, or pen.
Let someone go through your Spotify or YouTube history and read out something embarrassing.
Do your best 'moan' — loud enough for a neighbour to hear.
Let the person to your right write a one-line bio for your dating profile.
